actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to assure that certain publications of institutions of higher education continue to qualify as second-class mail.

summary.text: Provides that qualified publications of institutions of higher education continue to qualify as second-class mail. (Amends 39 U.S.C. 3626)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to assure that certain publications of institutions of higher education continue to qualify as second-class mail.
